title: Standard Deviation and Z-Scores
text: Think about how $$z-scores$$ indicate position relative to the mean in terms of standard deviations.

title: Interpreting Z-Score
text: If a data point is above the mean, its $$z-score$$ will be positive.

title: Finding Z-Score
text: The number of standard deviations a point is from the mean directly corresponds to its $$z-score$$.
